application.doc: Retrieving a list of all Verify Access Runtime server connections

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve all Verify Access Runtime server connections.
method.doc: To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command on the web service server connections resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

200 OK Content-Type:application/json [ { "connection": { "bindDN": "cn=root,secAuthority=Default", "ssl": true, "sslTruststore": "rt_profile_keys.kdb", "sslAuthKey": "server" }, "type": "isamruntime", "name": "VerifyAccessRuntimeConnection", "description": "The Verify Access runtime service connection", "locked": false, "uuid": "56e114b1-ddce-4558-95ae-0e60dda1018d" }, ... ]

representation.name: runtimeServersISVARuntimeJsonRsp
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: name
param.doc: The name given for this connection.

param.name: uuid
param.doc: A unique identifier for this connection. (Automatically generated, only visible in responses)

param.name: locked
param.doc: Controls whether the connection is allowed to be deleted. If not present, a default of 'false' will be assumed, except when updating an existing connection, where the existing lock status will be assumed.

param.name: bindDN
param.doc: The distinguished name to use to bind to the Verify Access Runtime LDAP server.

param.name: bindPwd
param.doc: The password for bindDN to use when binding to the Verify Access Runtime LDAP server. Note: The password is not returned in responses. When updating a connection, this parameter is optional.

param.name: ssl
param.doc: Controls whether SSL is used to establish the connection.

param.name: sslTruststore
param.doc: The key database to be used as an SSL truststore. This field is required when "ssl" is true.

param.name: sslAuthKey
param.doc: The name of the key which should be used during mutual authentication with the Verify Access runtime LDAP server.
